# AI Agent Instructions

## Project Overview
This is a new project in its initial setup phase. As the project grows, this file will be updated with essential knowledge to help AI agents be productive in this codebase.

## Current Project State
- Empty workspace ready for development
- Located at: `d:\Visualstudio-workspace\Hackathon`

### Integration Points

- API integrations

## Notes for AI Agents
